        <span>next_<wbr>hop_<wbr>in_<wbr>ip_<wbr>address</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Contains the IP address packets should be forwarded to.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span>next_<wbr>hop_<wbr>type</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The type of Azure hop the packet should be sent to.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

</dl>
{{% /choosable %}}
